details.description: AI model to auto-read, categorize, and process vendor invoices, reducing manual data entry.

aiInsight.title: Project has exceeded annual goals by 50%
aiInsight.reason: High user adoption and >10x efficiency gains in invoice processing.
aiInsight.recommendation: Scale this solution. AI analysis of 'Procurement' and 'Logistics' workflows suggests an additional $2M in potential value.

details.description: Gen-AI pilot to review third-party contracts and flag non-standard clauses.

aiInsight.title: 95% likely to fail 6-month ROI goal
aiInsight.reason: User adoption is 3%. The core business metric (Review Time) has not improved.
aiInsight.recommendation: Pause funding immediately. Investigate user adoption failure. Re-allocate remaining $250k budget to a high-ROI project.

details.description: Pilot chatbot for inbound lead qualification.

aiInsight.title: Pilot is on track
aiInsight.reason: Early data shows positive value generation, but not yet at scale.
aiInsight.recommendation: Continue pilot and re-evaluate at 90 days before scaling.
